content: this pattern is a great introduction to moasic knitting if you re comfortable with knitting in the round and you know how to knit purl and slip_stitch then you re ready to tackle mosaic knitting the knitting notes teach you how to do mosaic knitting and now to read mosaic knitting charts several of my testers had never done mosaic knitting and were so delighted with the results my favorite feedback mosaic was fun at first i thought you were crazy and i didn t believe it was going to work spoiler alert - it worked and the hat looks great you ll want to have about 100y of each color you re planning on using my gauge is generally looser than most so make sure you check your gauge before starting
